claims.claim: KHAI AI engine democratized access to 13,000 team members globally in 180 days
claims.quote: KHAI took about 180 days from idea to launch, and is now in the hands of about 13,000 team members globally, according to Nestor.

claims.claim: AI engine streamlined SAP rollouts in China and automated routine financials
claims.quote: The engine also helped streamline SAP rollouts in China and automate routine financials.

claims.claim: AI is becoming integral to various workflows with daily usage
claims.quote: It's really becoming an integral part of a variety of workflows

claims.claim: Teams analyze documents, optimize factory procedures, and access standard operating procedures using the platform
claims.quote: Team members use the platform to analyze and summarize documents or dense industry reports, as well as to optimize and access standard operating procedures on a factory floor.

claims.claim: The Cookbook AI agent went from idea to prototype in under three months
claims.quote: The tool, called The Cookbook, went from idea to prototype in fewer than three months, the company told CIO Dive.

claims.claim: AI investments have transformed ways of working and driven end-to-end improvements
claims.quote: Our investments in technology, particularly in AI, have transformed our ways of working. From improving demand forecasting to optimizing factory floor processes, we are driving end-to-end improvement.

claims.claim: The Cookbook provides access to 150 years of ketchup production expertise
claims.quote: Workers have access to 150 years of Kraft Heinz expertise in ketchup production.
